TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit StronglyTypedResourceBuilder extends System.Object
public ref class StronglyTypedResourceBuilder abstract sealed

summary.span: 为强类型资源提供支持。

span.span: Provides support for strongly typed resources.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，资源分隔代码从应用程序中的内容。Typically, resources separate code from content within an application. 创建和使用这些资源可以更轻松地开发可本地化的应用程序。Creating and consuming these resources makes it easier to develop localizable applications. 在.NET Framework 中，会占用的资源通常通过使用类，该类包含在运行时提供特定于区域性的资源的访问权限的方法。In the .NET Framework, resources are usually consumed by using the class, which contains methods that provide access to culture-specific resources at run time. 有关创建和使用资源的详细信息，请参阅[桌面应用中的资源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ad495d4-2941-40cf-bf64-e82e85825890)。For more information about creating and consuming resources, see [Resources in Desktop Apps](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ad495d4-2941-40cf-bf64-e82e85825890). 强类型的资源的支持是一种编译时功能，通过创建类包含一组静态的只读的封装对资源的访问 (`get`) 属性。Strongly typed resource support is a compile-time feature that encapsulates access to resources by creating classes that contain a set of static, read-only (`get`) properties. 这提供了一种方法来消耗资源，而不是调用和方法。This provides an alternative way to consume resources instead of calling the and methods. 提供强类型化的资源支持的基本功能类 (以及`/str`中的命令行选项[Resgen.exe （资源文件生成器）](~/docs/framework/tools/resgen-exe-resource-file-generator.md))。The basic functionality for strongly typed resource support is provided by the class (as well as the `/str` command-line option in the [Resgen.exe (Resource File Generator)](~/docs/framework/tools/resgen-exe-resource-file-generator.md)). 输出方法是一个类，包含输入参数中引用的资源相匹配的强类型的属性。The output of the method is a class that contains strongly typed properties that match the resources that are referenced in the input parameter. 此类提供对在处理的文件中可用的资源的只读访问。This class provides read-only access to the resources that are available in the file processed. ## Examples 下面的示例生成一个名为类`DemoResources`编写 C# 或 Visual Basic 中 （具体取决于该示例的源代码）。The following example generates a class named `DemoResources` that is written in C# or Visual Basic (depending on the example's source code). 此类是在`DemoApp`命名空间和已返回的一个徽标位图和应用程序的名称的属性。This class is in the `DemoApp` namespace and has properties that return the bitmap of a logo and the name of an application. 此示例调用`CreateResourceFile`方法来创建必要的.resw 文件，需要一个名为 Logo.bmp 的位图文件位于该示例的当前目录。The example calls a `CreateResourceFile` method to create the necessary .resw file and requires that a bitmap file named Logo.bmp be found in the example's current directory. 代码示例使用名为 demo.resx 的以下资源文件：The code example uses the following resource file, named demo.resx: [!code-csharp[System.Resources.Tools.StronglyTypedResourceBuilder.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.tools.stronglytypedresourcebuilder.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.Tools.StronglyTypedResourceBuilder.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.tools.stronglytypedresourcebuilder.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] 应用程序代码然后可以按如下所示使用类：Your application code can then use the class as follows: [!code-csharp[System.Resources.Tools.StronglyTypedResourceBuilder.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.tools.stronglytypedresourcebuilder.class/cs/demoresources.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.Tools.StronglyTypedResourceBuilder.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.tools.stronglytypedresourcebuilder.class/vb/demoresources.vb#2)]

summary.span: 生成一个类文件，该文件包含与输入参数中所指定的资源相匹配的强类型属性。

span.span: Generates a class file that contains strongly typed properties that match the resources that are specified in the input parameter.

param.name: resourceList
param.span: 集合，其中每个字典项键/值对都是资源的名称和值。

span.span: An collection where each dictionary entry key/value pair is the name of a resource and the value of the resource.

param.name: baseName
param.span: 要生成的类的名称。

span.span: The name of the class to be generated.

param.name: generatedCodeNamespace
param.span: 要生成的类的命名空间。

span.span: The namespace of the class to be generated.

param.name: codeProvider
param.span: 一个 类，该类提供生成该类所使用的语言。

span.span: A class that provides the language in which the class will be generated.

param.name: internalClass
param.span: 如果为 ，则生成内部类；如果为 ，则生成公共类。

span.span: to generate an internal class; to generate a public class.

param.name: unmatchable
param.span: 一个数组，该数组包含无法为其生成属性的每个资源名称。

span.span: An array that contains each resource name for which a property cannot be generated.

param.span: 通常，属性无法生成是因为资源名称不是一个有效的标识符。

span.span: Typically, a property cannot be generated because the resource name is not a valid identifier.

summary.span: 生成一个类文件，该文件包含与指定集合中所引用的资源相匹配的强类型属性。

span.span: Generates a class file that contains strongly typed properties that match the resources referenced in the specified collection.
A container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以生成类提供强类型化的只读包装器访问的资源中包含的`resourceList`参数。Use the method to generate a class that provides a strongly typed, read-only wrapper to access the resources that are contained in the `resourceList` parameter. 类会忽略字符"$"开头的任何资源名称或">>"。The class ignores any resource name that begins with the characters "$" or ">>". 资源名称"Culture"和"ResourceManager"是无效的标识符。The resource names "Culture" and "ResourceManager" are invalid identifiers.

span.span: , , or is .

exception.span: 资源节点名称与它在 中的密钥不匹配。

span.span: A resource node name does not match its key in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以生成类提供对中包含的资源的强类型化的只读访问`resxFile`参数。Use the method to generate a class that provides strongly typed, read-only access to the resources that are contained in the `resxFile` parameter. 类会忽略字符"$"开头的任何资源名称或">>"。The class ignores any resource name that begins with the characters "$" or ">>". 资源名称"Culture"和"ResourceManager"是无效的标识符。The resource names "Culture" and "ResourceManager" are invalid identifiers.

A container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载，可使用`resourcesNamespace`参数来指定为生成的资源的命名空间。This overload enables you to use the `resourcesNamespace` parameter to specify the namespace for the generated resources. 在这种情况下，生成的代码如下所示：In this case, the generated code appears as follows: ``` System.Resources.ResourceManager rm = new System.Resources.ResourceManager(".",typeof(baseName).Assembly); ``` 在大多数情况下，不需要在应用程序代码中调用此方法。In most cases, you do not need to call this method from your application code. 类会忽略字符"$"开头的任何资源名称或">>"。The class ignores any resource name that begins with the characters "$" or ">>". 资源名称"Culture"和"ResourceManager"是无效的标识符。The resource names "Culture" and "ResourceManager" are invalid identifiers.

span.span: , , or is .

exception.span: 资源节点名称与它在 中的密钥不匹配。

span.span: A resource node name does not match its key in .

MemberSignature.Value: public static string VerifyResourceName (string key, System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider provider);
.method public static hidebysig string VerifyResourceName(string key, class System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider provider) cil managed
Public Shared Function VerifyResourceName (key As String, provider As CodeDomProvider) As String
public: static System::String ^ VerifyResourceName(System::String ^ key, System::CodeDom::Compiler::CodeDomProvider ^ provider);
static member VerifyResourceName : string * System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider -> string

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: key
param.span: 待验证的字符串，如有必要，则转换为有效的资源名称。

span.span: The string to verify and, if necessary, convert to a valid resource name.

param.name: provider
param.span: 对象，它指定将使用的目标语言。

span.span: A object that specifies the target language to use.

summary.span: 根据指定的输入字符串和代码提供程序，生成一个有效的资源字符串。

span.span: Generates a valid resource string based on the specified input string and code provider.

returns.span: 派生自 参数的有效资源名称。

span.span: A valid resource name derived from the parameter.

returns.span: 如果根据 参数所指定的语言，派生的字符串仍包含无效字符，所有无效标记都会被下划线 (_) 字符或 替代。

span.span: Any invalid tokens are replaced with the underscore (_) character, or if the derived string still contains invalid characters according to the language specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`key`参数有效的字符串的字符，则返回该字符串。If the `key` parameter is a valid string of characters, that string is returned. 如果`key`参数是字符串无效或包含无效字符的字符串方法将尝试生成基于的有效字符串`key`和`provider`参数。If the `key` parameter is an invalid string or a string that contains invalid characters, the method attempts to generate a valid string based on the `key` and `provider` parameters. 如果可以生成有效的字符串，返回字符串;否则为`null`返回。If a valid string can be generated, that string is returned; otherwise, `null` is returned. 如果`key`参数为空字符串 ("")，返回单个下划线字符 (_) 所组成的字符串。If the `key` parameter is an empty string (""), a string that consists of a single underscore character (_) is returned. 如果`key`参数不是空字符串，方法比较一组基于指定的语言的无效标记到字符串中的每个字符`provider`参数。If the `key` parameter is not an empty string, the method compares each character in the string to a set of invalid tokens based on the language specified by the `provider` parameter. 在字符串中的任何无效字符替换为下划线字符。Any invalid character in the string is replaced with an underscore character. 将替换为下划线字符如下所示：The characters that will be replaced with an underscore are as follows: （空格）、 U + 00A0 （非换行空格） '。（句点）、 （逗号） ';'（分号）|，~，@，#、 %，^，&、 \*，+、-，/、\\'，'\<，>、？，[，]，（'，'）、 {，}，"（引号），' '（撇号），:，和 ！。' ' (space), U+00A0 (non-breaking space), '.' (period), ',' (comma), ';' (semicolon), '|', '~', '@', '#', '%', '^', '&', '\*', '+', '-', '/', '\\', '\<', '>', '?', '[', ']', '(', ')', '{', '}', '"' (quote), ''' (apostrophe), ':', and '!'. > [!NOTE] > 强类型的资源不允许使用语言关键字 (如`if`， `for`，依此类推) 作为资源键名称。Strongly typed resources do not allow the use of language keywords (such as `if`, `for`, and so on) as resource key names. 但是，设计模式允许通过在关键字前面加下划线字符的语言关键字使用。However, the design pattern allows the use of language keywords by prefixing the keyword with the underscore character. 方法调用方法来强制实施这种设计。The method calls the method to enforce this design. 例如，如果使用的资源名称的是相同的语言关键字，如`for`，该名称显示为`_for`生成的强类型的资源类中。For example, if you use a resource name that is the same as a language keyword, such as `for`, the name appears as `_for` in the generated strongly typed resource class.

span.span: or is .
